Module CamelotJava
Package com.actions

Interface IAction

All Known Implementing Classes:
AddToList, Attack, Bash, Cast, Clap, ClearList, CloseFurniture, Create, CreateEffect, Dance, Die, DisableEffect, DisableIcon, DisableInput, Draw, Drink, EnableEffect, EnableIcon, EnableInput, Enter, Exit, Face, FadeIn, FadeOut, Give, HideCredits, HideDialog, HideFurniture, HideList, HideMenu, HideNarration, Kneel, Laugh, LookAt, OpenFurniture, Pickup, PlaySound, Pocket, Put, Putdown, Revive, SetCameraBlend, SetCameraFocus, SetCameraMode, SetClothing, SetCredits, SetDay, SetDialog, SetExpression, SetHairColor, SetHairStyle, SetLeft, SetNarration, SetNight, SetPosition, SetRight, SetSkinColor, SetTitle, Sheathe, ShowCredits, ShowDialog, ShowFurniture, ShowList, ShowMenu, ShowNarration, Sit, Sleep, Take, Unpocket, Wait, WalkTo, Wave
public interface IAction
This class represents a Camelot action. All classes that implement this interface must determine the name of the corresponding Camelot action and whether we should wait for this action to complete
Author:
Alireza Shirvani
